The team actively collects massive datasets from Tesla Vehicles, creates ground truth of labeled images and videos, and deploys deep neural networks to our fleet of millions of Tesla cars. You will take ownership of the datasets of specific vision models (ex. stop signs) and make them large, high quality, and diverse. You will identify areas where neural networks are challenged (ex. even blue stop signs!), work with engineers to understand the requirements of neural networks, and set deliverables for the data annotation team. The data engine is the most crucial aspect of "pre-neural-network" development and has unlocked every major Autopilot customer release. Tesla Autopilot applies deep learning for autonomous driving at scale. The data engine is the most crucial aspect of "pre-neural-network" development and has unlocked every major Autopilot customer release.
